title: Social Media Image Sizes 2025 - Complete Guide for Every Platform
content:
Why Image Sizes Matter on Social Media

Each social platform has specific image dimensions for optimal display. Using wrong sizes results in:

  • Cropped or stretched images
  • Blurry or pixelated appearance
  • Poor engagement and reach
  • Unprofessional brand image

This guide covers current optimal sizes for all major platforms in 2025.

Instagram

Feed Posts

  • Square: 1080 x 1080 px (1:1)
  • Portrait: 1080 x 1350 px (4:5) - takes up more screen space
  • Landscape: 1080 x 566 px (1.91:1)

Tip: Portrait (4:5) gets the most engagement as it dominates mobile screens.

Stories & Reels

  • Size: 1080 x 1920 px (9:16)
  • Safe zone: Keep important content away from top 250px and bottom 250px

Profile Picture

  • Size: 320 x 320 px (displays as circle)
  • Tip: Upload 500 x 500 px for future-proofing

Carousel Posts

  • Same sizes as feed posts
  • All images in carousel must be same aspect ratio
  • Up to 10 images per carousel

Facebook

Feed Posts

  • Recommended: 1200 x 630 px (1.91:1)
  • Square: 1200 x 1200 px (1:1)
  • Portrait: 1080 x 1350 px (4:5)

Cover Photo

  • Size: 820 x 312 px (desktop)
  • Mobile display: 640 x 360 px (center portion)
  • Tip: Keep important elements in center

Profile Picture

  • Size: 170 x 170 px (desktop), 128 x 128 px (mobile)
  • Upload: 500 x 500 px minimum

Event Cover

  • Size: 1200 x 628 px

Stories

  • Size: 1080 x 1920 px (9:16)

TikTok

Video

  • Size: 1080 x 1920 px (9:16)
  • Safe zone: Account for UI overlays on right side and bottom

Profile Picture

  • Size: 200 x 200 px minimum

LinkedIn

Feed Posts

  • Recommended: 1200 x 627 px (1.91:1)
  • Square: 1200 x 1200 px

Company Page Banner

  • Size: 1128 x 191 px

Profile Picture

  • Size: 400 x 400 px

Background Photo

  • Size: 1584 x 396 px

Twitter/X

Feed Posts

  • Single image: 1200 x 675 px (16:9) or 1200 x 1200 px (1:1)
  • Two images: 700 x 800 px each
  • Multiple images: Varies by layout

Header Photo

  • Size: 1500 x 500 px

Profile Picture

  • Size: 400 x 400 px

Pinterest

Standard Pin

  • Recommended: 1000 x 1500 px (2:3)
  • Long pins: 1000 x 2100 px (perform better)

Square Pin

  • Size: 1000 x 1000 px

Profile Picture

  • Size: 165 x 165 px

YouTube

Thumbnail

  • Size: 1280 x 720 px (16:9)
  • File size: Under 2MB

Channel Banner

  • Size: 2560 x 1440 px
  • Safe area: 1546 x 423 px (center)

Profile Picture

  • Size: 800 x 800 px

General Best Practices

Image Quality

  • Always upload highest quality possible
  • Platforms compress images - start sharp
  • Use PNG for graphics, JPEG for photos
  • Upscale small images with Pixelift AI Upscaler

Text on Images

  • Keep text minimal (under 20% of image)
  • Use large, readable fonts
  • High contrast between text and background
  • Account for mobile viewing

Branding

  • Consistent style across platforms
  • Use brand colors
  • Include logo where appropriate

Tools for Creating Social Images

  • Canva - templates for all sizes
  • Adobe Express - quick resize tool
  • Pixelift Background Remover - clean product shots
  • Pixelift Compressor - optimize file sizes

Quick Reference Table

  • Instagram Feed: 1080 x 1350 px
  • Instagram/Facebook Stories: 1080 x 1920 px
  • Facebook Feed: 1200 x 630 px
  • LinkedIn: 1200 x 627 px
  • Twitter/X: 1200 x 675 px
  • Pinterest: 1000 x 1500 px
  • YouTube Thumbnail: 1280 x 720 px
  • TikTok: 1080 x 1920 px
excerpt: Complete 2025 guide to social media image sizes for Instagram, Facebook, TikTok, LinkedIn, Twitter, Pinterest, and YouTube. Includes dimensions for all post types.
